description.initial_rating: Starting rating for all new players (default: 1500)
description.initial_rd: Starting Rating Deviation (uncertainty). Lower = less volatile. Range: 100-350
description.tau: System volatility constraint. Higher = more volatile ratings. Range: 0.3-2.0
description.weight_multiplier: Multiplier for micromatch weights. Higher = bigger rating swings. Range: 1.0-3.0
description.epsilon: Convergence tolerance for calculations. Don't change unless you know what you're doing.
description.rating_scaling.enabled: Enable rating-based scaling that adjusts changes based on rating difference vs opponents
description.rating_scaling.rating_sensitivity: Controls scaling strength. Higher = less aggressive. Range: 200-500
description.rating_scaling.rd_dampening: Reduces scaling effect for high RD players. Higher = more dampening. Range: 0.01-0.03
description.rating_scaling.max_scaling: Maximum multiplier for rating changes. Range: 1.3-2.0
description.rating_scaling.min_scaling: Minimum multiplier for rating changes. Range: 0.5-0.9
